FuncDef:
The md ma command specifies the maintenance domain (MD) and maintenance association (MA) for sending NQA test packets.
The undo md command deletes the configured MD.
By default, no MD is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an MD.
The value is a string of 1 to 43 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the name of an MA.
The value is a string of 1 to 43 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To specify the MD and MA for sending NQA test packets in a MAC ping test instance, run the md ma command. Connectivity faults are confirmed in the MA view.
Before you run the md command, run the fm md md-name [ format { no-md-name | dns dns-md-format-name | mac-address mac-md-format-name | string string-md-format-name } ] [ level level] to create an MD and run the ma ma-name [ format { icc-based iccbased-ma-format-name | string ma-format-name } ] to create an MA.
